result.execSummary:
The defendant Keory M Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: ***Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law prior being released from jail.***

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Keory M Jones

ADDRESS INFO for Brenda N Titus

Prior: 5920 16th St Apt 102, Racine, WI 53406 United States
Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Defendant Keory M Jones in court with attorney Dirk Christian Jensen.  Defendant Keory M Jones in custody.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Parties are requesting a plea and sentencing date.
BTC: Matter adjourned.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Keory M Jones in court with attorney Dirk Christian Jensen.  Defendant Keory M Jones in custody.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Def is requesting an adjournment for State to get an offer out to them.
BTC: Matter adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Keory M Jones in court with attorney Dirk Christian Jensen.  Defendant Keory M Jones in custody.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Deft has a pending felony.
Def is requesting an adjournment.
Cases may be consolidated.
BTC: Matter adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: ***7-13-15 $500 CASH BOND AMENDED TO $150 CASH. NEW CONDITIONS INCLUDE: DEFT MUST RESIDE W/MOTHER AT 1005 CENTER ST, RACINE WI 53403.  Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780). Exceptions are going to court and meeting w/his atty.No contact with the victim T.A.B.(person, property, residence or family).***   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Keory M Jones in court with attorney Dirk Christian Jensen.  Defendant Keory M Jones in custody.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Matter is scheduled for bond review by defense.
Def is requesting that bond be modified to a co-signature bond.
State is objects to any bond being modified.
Deft has a pending felony matter.
BTC: Motion to modify bond granted, modify bond to $150 cash on each file, amend bond to allow the same conditions from 15CF922 to be incorporated into these bonds.
Bail/bond hearing on July 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.
for bond review. - filed by Def
